name: Clown Horror Clicker
description:
Clown Horror Clicker - this is a terrible horror clicker about the character - the Clown Pennywise. Clown killer turns into what his victim is most afraid of. A terrible clown killer instills fear to satisfy his hunger.

- Clown killer Pennywise - the ancient essence of "IT".
- Clown killer Pennywise has the power to change its shape.
- Clown killer Pennywise feeds on fear.
- Clown killer Pennywise uses fear to improve their abilities.

( MoMo Horror Clicler is better. LOL

https://forfarm.itch.io/momo-horror-clicker )
